name: TCGoogleMaps
tagline: Get driving directions with Google Maps on iOS
body:
TCGoogleMaps is a sample app that shows how we can use Google Maps SDK for iOS, Google Places API and Google Directions API to build a simple navigation app.
*Search autocomplete with results sorted based on distance from your current location and relevance.* !["Google Places Autocomplete"](/images/Screenshot1.png "Google Places Autocomplete")
*Selecting a search result will give you the directions from your location to the selected destination.* !["Google Maps Directions"](/images/Screenshot2.png "Google Maps Directions")
*Tapping on the list icon will bring up turn-by-turn directions.* !["Turn-by-Turn Directions"](/images/Screenshot3.png "Turn-by-Turn Directions")
*Selecting a step from the list will zoom in on that specific step on the map.* !["Step-by-Step Directions on Map"](/images/Screenshot4.png "Step-by-Step Directions on Map")
###How to Build and Run
Build Requirements
Xcode 5, iOS 6.0 SDK or iOS 7.0 SDK, CocoaPods
Runtime Requirements
iOS 6.0 or iOS 7.0
####Step 1: Download and Install CocoaPods Follow the simple installation guide from . ####Step 2: Install Library Dependencies Run the following commands in Terminal.app: ``` $ cd $ pod install $ open TCGoogleMaps.xcworkspace ``` ####Step 3: Generate your API Keys 1. Go to [Google API Console](https://code.google.com/apis/console/) and generate your API key. 2. In Xcode, open `TCGoogleMaps\App\TCGoogleAPIKeys.m` and replace with your own API key: ```Objective-C NSString * const kTCGoogleMapsAPIKey = @"YOUR-API-KEY"; NSString * const kTCGooglePlacesAPIKey = @"YOUR-API-KEY"; ``` ###Open Source Libraries Used * AFNetworking - * MBProgressHUD - ###See Also * Google Maps SDK for iOS - * Google Places API - * Google Directions API - ###License This project's source code is provided for educational purposes only. Image resources are based on the icons used in Google Maps. See the LICENSE file for more info.
